use_cases.case: The mitochondrial genome (FQ311469) of Sporisorium reilianum SRZ2 was used as a reference for aligning the newly sequenced mitochondrial genome of Sporisorium scitamineum SSC39B.

The mitochondrial genome (FQ311469) of Sporisorium reilianum SRZ2 was used in a comparison of genome size and gene content between the mitochondrial genome of Sporisorium scitamineum SSC39B and other published mitochondrial genomes.
